info.question: What is AWS Import/Export Disk?
answers: A way of transferring your data into and out of AWS cloud using your own disk that you send to Amazon; the predecessor to Snowball
A way of using Snowball to transfer data to AWS
correctAnswer: A way of transferring your data into and out of AWS cloud using your own disk that you send to Amazon; the predecessor to Snowball

info.question: What are the three different types of Snowball?
Which type of Snowball is a petabyte-scale data transport solution that uses a secure appliance to transfer large amounts of data into and out of AWS?
Which type of Snowball has an 80TB size and 256-bit encryption?
Which type of Snowball is a 100TB data transfer device with on-board storage and compute capabilities?
Which of these are true about Snowball Edge?
answers: Can be used as a temporary storage tier for large local datasets
Can be used to support local workloads in remote or off-line locations
Can be clustered together with other Snowball Edge devices to form a local storage tier and process your data on premises, letting your applications run even when that can't access the cloud
Is a little AWS data center you can run on-premises which can run lambda functions
Comes on a semi-trailer and in a shipping container
correctAnswer: Can be used as a temporary storage tier for large local datasets
Can be used to support local workloads in remote or off-line locations
Can be clustered together with other Snowball Edge devices to form a local storage tier and process your data on premises, letting your applications run even when that can't access the cloud
Is a little AWS data center you can run on-premises which can run lambda functions

info.question: Which type of Snowball is for peta-byte or even exa-byte levels of data?
Which type of Snowball arrives in a shipping container and is hauled by a semi?
Which Snowball can be used to transfer a complete data center migration to AWS?
Snowball has a client that you use to interface with it?
Snowball comes with a kindle that you use to interface with it?
What does transfer acceleration use to speed up transfers to S3?
S3 Transfer Acceleration uses a _______ to upload directly to an Edge Location which will then transfer that file to S3?
